Plot.
Private detective John Shaft is hired by Harlem mobster Bumpy Jonas 
to find his kidnapped daughter. Bumpy has no idea who might have 
taken her but isn't as forthcoming as he could be about his situation. 
When his first lead peters out he thought it might be Black power 
advocates who took the girl - he acts on information from NYPD Lt. Vic 
Androzzi that outside mobsters are in town and might be trying to 
take over various illegal businesses in Harlem.
